full_text:
Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054
From Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To [redacted]
Date 2019/08/10 10:15
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good morning,

This is just a follow-up to our conversation this morning concerning Epstein, Jeffrey, Register No. 76318-054, who was found unresponsive in his cell at 6:33 a.m. Life-saving measures were performed by institution staff and EMS staff. He was escorted to the local hospital where he was later pronounced dead at 7:36 a.m. Should you require any additional information, please contact me. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423[redacted]
@bop.gov
